title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to permit Medicare select policies in all States and to modify the requirements with respect to such policies.
content: Amends the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1990 to: (1) make permanent the Medicare select policy program. And (2) allow access to Medicare select policies in all States. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to revise the Medicare select policy program and provide for a civil penalty for misrepresentations made in connection with a Medicare select policy.
